column4: hello, I have a dependency problem when installing the package `libxslt1-dev`: libxslt1-dev : Depends: libxslt1.1 (= 1.1.26-8ubuntu1) but 1.1.26-8ubuntu1.1 is to be installed
how would I approach the problem to fix it
what version of ubuntu, what version is that package from
xubuntu 12.04, the package provides development files (sources) for libxslt
